abstract: Pedro Nunez Delacruz, driver of livery car that was struck in Brooklyn killing passengers Nathan and Raizy Glauber in 2013, testifies in manslaughter trial of Jose Acevedo that he was not rushing at time of accident; also says he had seen no sign of Acevedo's vehicle when he entered intersection.
lead_paragraph: The livery driver who picked up a pregnant woman and her husband on their way to the hospital was not asked to hurry, he testified in the trial of the man accused of striking their car.

headline.main: Driver of Brooklyn Couple Killed in Crash Says He Was Not Rushing
headline.print_headline: Driver of Brooklyn Couple Killed in Crash Says He Was Not Rushing

snippet: The livery driver who picked up a pregnant woman and her husband on their way to the hospital was not asked to hurry, he testified in the trial of the man accused of striking their car.
